resources.string:
Kamla Nehru Institute of Technology, Sultanpur presents its 2017 edition of Anubhuti from 17th to 20th February. Anubhuti, the majestic spectacle of KNIT, Sultanpur. The palatial celebration of vibrant colors from our culture. A congenial event with exciting, entertaining and enticing episodes in its clutch.
If one were to judge college festivals simply by the nature of how fast they grow, Anubhuti would probably stand unparalleled in Uttar Pradesh. Ever since its inception in 2015, it has gone to become one of the biggest and highly anticipated cult fests in the region.
So what makes Anubhuti special? You would ask. What makes it stand out from amongst the thousands that are already there? Is it the wave after wave of participation, coming from each corner and even beyond, all participating into close to 40 events spanning 7 Categories-Dance, Drama, Music, Literary, Quiz, Fine Arts and photography? Or the full force of students brought down to a single location through a variety of stalls, exhibitions and performances. The Special Nights, the pinnacle of the extravaganza, previously having witnessed the likes of Gajendra Verma, Dinesh Raghuvanshi, Mumtaz Naseem, Kirti Kale and The Loons Band.
This year, Anubhuti\’17, honoring the \‘Royal\’ theme and tagline of Perfect is Boring, is going to be organized on an even larger scale, with ongoing talks of several international performances, a distinguished platter of exotic celebrities and experts in line to judge the various events. We also promise to come alive this year with a host of informals, exhibitions and stalls, for just about anyone in the fest looking to have the time of their lives.
So be the Alexander, or be the Leonidas just be the warrior. Muster up to defend the legacy of your empire. the kingship is on stake, as it's going to be ROYAL affair this time. Partake in imperial battle to conquer the throne and establish monumental regime. Come assimilate with us. Relish, win and create memories with us. Click selfie and groove on. Embark the regal warrior for battle of swords.

Be Royal, Be a knight.

string-array.name: dance_event_details
string-array.item: Dance, dance for the fun is easy. The tune is catching and will not stop. Dance, till the stars come down from the rafters. Dance, dance, dance till you drop. Be it bollywood, western, contemporary, jazz, salsa, hip-hop or what not just put on your dancing shoes and hit the floor.

• It is a group dance event. It is a 2 round event.
 • The group can be formed of minimum 5 members and maximum 20 members.
 • At least 5 members must be present on the stage at a time.

 • Round 1:
The groups have to show their 3 minutes performance for qualifying round. This performance should be the part of their complete performance.

 • Round 2:
It is the final round in which the groups have to show their complete performance of 8-12 minutes.

 Judging Criteria:

There will be extra marks for theme based performances, use of props, formations, stunts , coordination and stage utilization.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

• There will be 3 rounds in this event where participants will show their dance forms individually.
 • Dance forms can vary from western hip hop to typical freestyle bollywood to folk to classical.

 • Round 1:
Participants will have to perform for 1:30-2 minutes.
 • Round 2:
The complete performance of 3-4 minutes of the qualified participants will be judged.
 • Round 3:
This will be a face-off between any two randomly chosen participants with music given on the spot. The music track of the two participants will be mixed accordingly, switching from one participant to another.

 Judging Criteria:

There will be extra marks for theme based performances, use of props, stage utilization, expressions, energy level, costumes. Any kind of fusion will be encouraged.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

• In this event dance will be performed in pair.
 • Dance forms can vary from western hip-hop to freestyle bollywood.

 • Round 1:
It is the qualifying round. Pairs have to perform for 1:30-2 mins.
 • Round 2:
It is a prop round where each pair will be given a prop. They will be given 24 hours to add a small portion of dance using that prop in their complete performance. The time for the utilization of prop can vary and judging will be done on the basis of best utilization of prop. Total time for the performance is 4-5 minutes.

 Judging Criteria:

There will be extra marks for story, proper utilization of props, compatibility, rhythm, lifts, chemistry, and costumes.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

It is an online event open to all. Anyone who wants to show his/her dance talent can upload his/her video performing on any song for about 1:30-2 min.
 • The selected contestants have to gather as many people as they can and have to upload another video performing on that same song with their whole group this time.

 There will be no registration fee for the winning performer!!!


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

Here participants have to perform on any random song played by the organizing team. The team will pick up any random participant at first, after their performance they have to challenge any other contestant and in the same manner the event will continue.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

string-array.name: singing_event_details
string-array.item: There is certainly some magic in human voice which is not there in any other sound. Every human voice has got an unmatchable flavour which makes it unique. So unleash the singer within you.

If you can swim in the ocean of melody and mesmerize the audience with the God-gifted beauty of your voice then yes, this event is for you.

 Rounds:

PRELIM
1. The participants have to sing a song of their choice.
 2. Time limit 3 minutes excluding the sound check. 3. The participants can bring the karaoke or can play an accompanying instrument his/her or can take the help of a friend for that or sing without any music if he wishes to.
 4. No backing vocals allowed.
 5. The decisions of the judges will be fine and binding in all cases.

 FINALE:

(i)Participants Choice Round:
1. Sing a song of your choice.
 2. Time limit: 4 minutes (excluding the sound check).
 3. The participants can use the karaoke or bring along an accompanying instrument/friend for playing the instrument.
 4. No backing vocals allowed.

 (ii)Judges Choice Round:
1. You have to sing a song of the judges\’ choice.
 2. No time limit.
 3. The decision of the judges shall be final and binding in all the cases

Anubhuti gives you the freedom to use any combination of instruments or vocals or both and captivate the audience leaving them spellbound.

 Rules:

PRELIM
1. The couple has to give a performance of their own choice.
 2. Time limit: 5 minutes (excluding sound check).
 3. If both the members of a couple are vocalists they can bring the karaoke along with them.
 4. If one of the two is an instrumentalist, then they are required to carry the instruments they require. No bar on the number of the instruments played.
 5. No extra accompanists will be allowed.
 6. The short-listed couples will move to the final round where they will be shuffled to form random pairs.

 FINALE:
1. The couple has to give a performance of their own choice.
 2. Time limit: 5 minutes (excluding sound check).
 3. If both the members of a couple are vocalists they can bring the karaoke along with them.
 4. If one of the two is an instrumentalist, then they are required to carry the instruments they require. No bar on the number of the instruments played.
 5. No extra accompanists will be allowed.
 6. The decision of the judges shall be final and binding in all cases.

Let us take you with us on wings of melody into the sky of music where you can cherish the beautiful music of the musical instruments that will keep you enchanted throughout the event. Rock music, ghazal, qawwali or any raag is welcomed in this event.

 Rules:

 1. Participants : Minimum 3 and maximum 5 members team.
 2. There will be only one round in the competition.
 3. Time limit: 10 minutes (excluding sound check).
 4. Language: Hindi, English or fusion.
 5. The participating team has to bring along their instruments.
 6. Rock grunge or growls are not allowed.
 7. The decision of the judges shall be final and binding in all cases.

(i) Bands will be given 30 minutes- amplifiers off to off. Points will be deducted on exceeding the time limit.
 (ii) At least one song performed must be an original composition.
 (iii) The band members can remould the music and the lyrics of the song they are performing according to their wish.
 (iv) Emphasis will be laid on innovation and the new ideas of the band.

 Rules:

 1. Band Members: At least 3 people and at maximum 7 people on the stage.
 2. At least 3 instruments are required (different guitars are counted separately).
 3. Judges decision shall be final and binding in all cases.

string-array.name: drama_event_details
string-array.item: This is a theatre show consisting of mass showing their acting skills. Get geared up to play with pride in your own way to capture the heart beats with your acting skills. Go for glory, now or never.

Rules:

 1. The Act shall be performed by a single actor on stage.
 2. Act prepared should be within the time limits of 3-10 min.
 3. It can be in English, Hindi or Both.
 4. The Act can be an original script or an adaptation. In each case the abstract should be submitted with the event coordinator before due date.
 5. Any props needed will have to be arranged by the participant himself. The props should not be explosive, flammable, permanent paints or volatile.
 6. No physical interactions with the audience is permitted.
 7. Whole event shall be judged by the Judges panel disclosed just before the event itself.
 8. The judge's decision in any factor shall be unchallengeable and final.
 9. Play will be judged on the basis of Acting, presentation, use of props, script, creativity and Overall experience of the audience.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

Rules:

 1. Team may consist of 5-15 registered members. Members may or may not be of the same college.
 2. The Mime prepared should be within the time limits of 10-20 min. 3-5 min of which would be acted by the team for Preliminary round.
 3. Director, stage helpers, actors, etc. all are considered a part of the team and must be registered beforehand for event.
 4. Mime can be an original script or an adaptation. In each case the abstract should be submitted with the event coordinator before due date. Based on which the teams shall be shortlisted.
 5. A Team Leader should be appointed and mentioned in the abstract who would be responsible for all communication with the coordinators.
 6. Any props needed will have to be arranged by the team itself. The props should not be explosive, flammable, permanent paints or volatile.
 7. No physical interactions with the audience is permitted.
 8. The mime shall be judged by the Judges panel disclosed just before the event itself.
 9. The judge's decision in any factor shall be unchallengeable and final.
 10. Play will be judged on the basis of Acting, presentation, use of props, script, creativity and Overall experience of the audience.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

Rules:

 1. Team may consist of 12-25 registered members (including all music accompanists). Members may or may not be of the same college.
 2. The Street Play prepared should be within the time limits of 15-20 min. The team must perform a glimpse or trailer of the street play that they will perform in the finals, if shortlisted. It can be in English, Hindi or Both.
 3. Director, music accompanists, actors, etc. all are considered a part of the team and must be registered beforehand for event.
 4. Street Play can be an original or an adaptation. In each case the abstract should be submitted with the event coordinator before due date. Based on which the team shall be shortlisted
 5. A Team Leader should be appointed and mentioned in the abstract who would be responsible for all communication with the coordinators.
 6. Any props needed will have to be arranged by the team itself. The props should not be explosive, flammable, permanent paints or volatile.
 7. No physical interactions with the audience is permitted.
 8. The play shall be judged by the Judges panel disclosed just before the event itself.
 9. The judge's decision in any factor shall be unchallengeable and final.
 10. Play will be judged on the basis of Acting, presentation, use of props, relevance of topic, creativity and Overall experience of the audience.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

Rules:

 1. Team may consist of 3-4 registered members. Members may or may not be of the same college.
 2. The Act prepared should be within the time limits of 5-7 min.
 3. Act can be in English, Hindi or Both.
 4. All members of team must be registered beforehand and no external help shall be entertained during the event.
 5. Act can be an original or an adaptation.
 6. A Team Leader should be appointed who would be responsible for all communication with the coordinators.
 7. Number of rounds may vary based on number of participating teams.
 8. Any props needed will have to be arranged by the team itself in real time. The props should not be explosive, flammable, permanent paints or volatile.
 9. No physical interactions with the audience is permitted.
 10. The Act shall be judged by the Judges panel disclosed just before the event itself.
 11. The judge's decision in any factor shall be unchallengeable and final.
 12. Play will be judged on the basis of Acting, presentation, use of props, script, creativity and Overall experience of the audience.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

Rules:

 1. Team may consist of 2-15 registered members. Members may or may not be of the same college.
 2. The Play prepared should be within the time limits of 20-35 min. 5-10 min of which would be acted by the team for Preliminary round.
 3. Play can be in English, Hindi or Both.
 4. Director, stage helpers, actors, etc. all are considered a part of the team and must be registered beforehand for event.
 5. Play can be an original script or an adaptation. In each case the abstract should be submitted with the event coordinator before due date. Based on which the teams shall be shortlisted.
 6. A Team Leader should be appointed and mentioned in the abstract who would be responsible for all communication with the coordinators.
 7. Any props needed will have to be arranged by the team itself. The props should not be explosive, flammable, permanent paints or volatile.
 8. No physical interactions with the audience is permitted.
 9. The play shall be judged by the Judges panel disclosed just before the event itself.
 10. The judge's decision in any factor shall be unchallengeable and final.
 11. Play will be judged on the basis of Acting, presentation, use of props, script, creativity and Overall experience of the audience.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

string-array.name: fine_arts_event_details
string-array.item: Time to bring out the artist in you! paint a picture. Fill up colours and bring it to life, sketch fairy land and live your dream. Conjure a land of mysteries with your intricate design, bring out the child in you and go crazy with colours, Fill your soul with the million hues of joy of fantasy and ecstasy of love. Forget about everything. Come here with us in ANUBHUTI and experience how it feels to dwell in a world of your own.

Rules:

 1. This is a team event. Each team will have 2 members.
 2. The event will be conducted in one round.
 3. The participants will be provided with A3 sheets, quilling paper strips and basic quilling tools.
 4. Each team will make a 2D craftwork on the A3 sheet provided.
 5. Time Limit: 2 Hours

Rules:

 1. Individual event.
 2. The event will be conducted in one round.
 3. The participants will be provided colors, A3 sheets and other logistics at the site of event.
 4. Time Limit: 2 Hours

Rules:

 1. Individual event.
 2. Theme will be given on the spot.
 3. There will be two rounds.
 4. In the preliminary round, each participant will be given an A3 sheet, colors and other logistics.
 5. Top 5 participants of prelims reach final.
 6. Participants qualifying the prelims will participate in the final round in which they will be given canvas, painting brushes and colors.
 7. Theme will be the same, the one which participant has chosen in prelims.
 8. Time Limit:
Prelims: 2 Hours
Finals: 3 Hours

Rules:

 1. Individual event.
 2. The event will be conducted in one round.
 3. Theme will be given on the spot.
 4. Participants will be provided with A3 sheets, charcoal pencils and other logistics at the site of event.
 5. Time Limit: 2.5 Hours

Rules:

 1. This is a team event. Each team will have 2 members.
 2. Theme will be given on the spot.
 3. There will be two rounds.
 4. In the preliminary round, each team will be given an A3 sheet, colors and other logistics.
 5. Each team needs to make a design on a paper provided.
 6. Top 5 teams of prelims reach final.
 7. Team qualifying the prelims will participate in the final round in which they will be given a white T-Shirt, colors, brushes and other logistics.
 8. Teams have to draw the design on the T-Shirt provided.
 9. Theme will be the same, the one which team has chosen in prelims.
 10. Time limit: Prelims: 1 Hours, Finals: 2 Hours

Rules:

 1. This is a team event. Each team will have 2 members. One member will paint on the other’s member face.
 2. The event will be conducted in one round.
 3. Theme will be given on the spot.
 4. Stickers and any kind of make-up items are not allowed.
 5. All logistics shall be provided on the spot.
 6. Time Limit: 2 Hours

string-array.name: photography_event_details
string-array.item: Capture the light, capture the emotions, the shades of shadows, bliss of nature, contrast it, brighten the imagination, click the innovation. A show off of skill of camera; \'picture is worth a thousand words\', so let you clicks do the talking.

Pic Mania is an online Theme-Based Photography event. This event provides a platform to all the Shutter bugs out there to showcase their talent. The event is all about creativity, perception and imagination. So take out your camera, escalate your creativity and boost your imagination. Get…Set…Click!!!
Themes will be provided on the Facebook pages of Anubhuti and KNIT Photography. Time Duration will be 24 hrs. The entries must be emailed along with the Participant’s Name, College Name and a Caption.

 Judging Criterion:
 • The first and foremost criteria is the Resemblance to the given theme.
 • The Quality of the picture.
 • The picture will be uploaded on Facebook page.
 • Based on the Number of Likes and Additional Points for vivid imagination and creativity , the total scoring for an entry will be done.

Picturesque is an online Photography-technique based event. Shutterbugs will be given a type of photography technique using which the entry should be clicked. This event is all about photographer’s knowledge and understanding about that particular technique.The Type will be provided on the Facebook pages of Anubhuti and KNIT Photography.
 Time Duration will be 24 hrs. The entries will be accepted on the given email-id.

 Judging Criterion:
 • The clicked picture should be based on the given Type of photography.
 • Marks will be awarded on the Quality of the picture.
 • The picture will be uploaded on Facebook page.
 • Based on the Number of Likes and Additional Points for vivid imagination and creativity, the total scoring for an entry will be done.

• It is a GIF making event.
 • The duration of the GIF should be maximum 10 seconds.
 • It is a Team event comprising of 2 members.
 • Teams will be given a Theme on which they have to make the GIF.
 • Theme will be provided on the Facebook pages of Anubhuti and KNIT Photography.
 • Entries will be entertained within 48 hrs after the commencement of the event.

 Judging Criterion:
 • Resemblance to the theme will be considered most important while grading.
 • Quality of the GIF prepared must be decent.
 • The points awarded will be based on the No. Of Likes.
 • Creativity and Imagination is encouraged and will also be awarded.

• It is a Team Event comprising of 2 Members.
 • Each video will be Theme based.
 • Theme will be provided on the Facebook pages of Anubhuti and KNIT Photography.
 • The Duration of the video should be 2-3 min.
 • Entries will be accepted within 3 days after the commencement of the event.

 Judging Criterion:
 • Resemblance to the theme will be an important factor.
 • Quality of the video should be optimum.
 • The video will be uploaded on Facebook. And based on the No. of Likes. The video will be awarded points.
 • Creativity and imagination will also have an equivalent weight on final judging.

Well here comes the most exciting event. This event is a combination of both deductions and photography. You will be required to solve clues in order to click. Teams will be provided with 10 independent clues. Teams will be required to click a picture for each solved clue. Pictures will be accepted on the given email-id. The event duration will be of 3 hrs 

 Judging Criterion:
 • Teams will be awarded points for each clue solved correctly.
 • The number of members in a team should be at most 3.
 • Extra marks for Quality of the picture.

string-array.name: quiz_event_details
string-array.item: A puzzle a day keeps the dumbness away. Watched the Derek \'O\' Brien quiz as a kid, but haven\'t put your quizzing hat for a long time. Now it\'s time to awaken the quizzer in you and test yourself with a variety of quizzes. Arm yourselves with your facts and battle it out to be crowned ‘the ultimate quizzer’.

\u2022 This quiz will contain questions about anything present on the face of the earth.\n \u2022 The quiz will contain two rounds a prelims and a final round.\n \u2022 Participants will qualify on the basis on the written preliminary round.

\u2022 This quiz wil contain questions on films literature music ,paintings …every form of art and entertainment present out there.\n \u2022 The quiz will contain two rounds a prelims and a final round.\n \u2022 Participants will qualify on the basis on the written preliminary round.

\u2022 The quiz contain questions related to brands, companies and the whole business world\n \u2022 The quiz will contain two rounds a prelims and a final round.\n \u2022 Participants will qualify on the basis on the written preliminary round.

• The quiz will be held on Dare2compete.com.
 • The quiz will be of 30 mins.
 • The quiz will contain 20 questions.

string-array.name: literature_event_details
string-array.item: Bang on ! Biggest war of words is here. Fathom your acumen, spontaneity and of course concrete content, all that matters is your communication skills.

A mashup of brainstorming thoughts which tickle your grey matter, we rightfully call it, the speaker\’s 'As you like it.' You need creativity of the mind and above all a brave heart to handle some unconventional twists. If you think you can stand apart to win this, the stage is all yours.

 Rules

 Preliminary Round:
 • Individual based event.
 • A topic is allotted to each contestant 40 seconds before speaking for preparation.
 • Participants must speak for atleast 2 minutes and 30 seconds is appended for conclusion to this time.
 • Judging criteria include wit, delivery, and expression (and humor).
 • The decision of the judges is final and cannot be challenged.

 Final Round:
 • Around 10 to 12 participants will be selected from preliminary round for this.
 • All the rules of the preliminary round apply to the final round. Rest to be brought out of the box directly on the event day.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

Ideas run wild without discussion so let\’s put them forth and discuss. Here is a platform for you to do the same. Do not wait and watch rather come and speak and if you can\’t add to the discussion then don\’t subtract by talking. If you see yourself as a change and want others to listen and bring a change, then this is for you.

 Rules

 Preliminary Round:
 • This is an individual event.
 • Participants will be divided into groups of 6-6 participants each.
 • There will be a topic given for discussion and the participants will have to discuss on the same for 5 to 8 minutes.
 • Negative marks will be given to a participant who exceeds the time limit given for • presenting their view.
 • Any kind of profanity will directly lead to elimination.
 • Judges\’ decision will be final and cannot be challenged.

 Final Round:
 • Around 10 to 12 from the preliminary round will be selected for this.
 • Further details will be revealed at the time of the event.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

"Speak clearly if you speak at all, Carve every word before you let it fall!!"
Do you consider yourself concerned for English language? Are you confident enough to speak grammatically correct English? So, here is your chance to unleash that talent of yours!! Keep speaking for one minute and rack up the points. Spot the mistakes and snatch your chance, after all, you have just a minute to win it!

 Rules:
 • This is an individual event.
 • Speak for as long as you can (as directed by jam master).
 • Spot the mistakes in other\’s speech.
 • Never forget that JAM MASTER IS GOD.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

"It matters not how strait the gate,
How charged with punishments the scroll,
I am the master of my fate:
I am the captain of my soul."
Of course! You all are, and now it\’s your turn to pen down your emotions and experiences with your own poems and be your own Wordsworth. You have a flash of insight, a metaphor for understanding change, a parallel to existence or just an inside reflection on what is wrong/right with the world. So let your ideas forge your feelings into a perspective and let your estrofa personify your imaginations.
Between your finger and thumb squat pen rests; snug as a gun. And as the Marvin Bell has said; "You need nothing more to write poems than bits of string and thread and some dust from under the bed". Estrofa is a platform where you can showcase your talent of writing and delivering your own poems. So it’s your turn to amplify your talent.

 Rules:
 • Each participant will be provided 6 to 8 minutes for presenting and introducing their piece or composition.
 • The poem being presented should be one\’s own creation.
 • Only individual participation is allowed. Mail your poem at englishliterary@anbti.in.
 • Shortlisted candidates will be notified via mail and have to present their poem during the event.
 • Participant may represent more than one poem on stage within the given time limit.
 • The event is unilingual in nature: participants may represent their pieces in English only.
 • Plagiarism will not be tolerated and shall lead to disqualification. The poem should not be copied from any source.
 • Judging criteria include delivery, relevance to topic and uniqueness.
 • Judge\’s (Judges’) decision shall be final and binding.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

When Antony climbed the stage, crowd was speaking against Ceaser, but before coming down he made sure that Ceaser was being hailed as their saviour. The incident is a perfect metaphor for the power an orator beholds in his words. So wake up the orator in you, we'll give you the podium and you have to find your Ceaser. Move the crowd with your words, present your skills and be the knight in the Quest for Antony.

 Rules:
 • This is an individual event.
 • All the participating candidates will be assigned a character and a scenario prior to the commencement of the fest via mail.
 • Each speaker will have to prepare his speech based upon the scenario and the character given and mail the same at "englishlit@anbti.in."
 • The matter in the speech should be your own creation.
 • Shortlisted candidates will be notified via mail and have to deliver the same speech during the event.
 • Additional props (if required) can be used but no marks will be given for that.
 • Speech can be of 4 to 5 minutes.
 • Results of judges will be final and cannot be challenged.


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

Want to be a news reporter??? So, here is your chance… Literary council through ANUBHUTI is giving you the platform to showcase this talent of yours…

 Rules:

 • This is a bilingual event.
 • It requires a team of not more than 3 members.
 • A participant can participate in only one language.
 • Cover entire ANUBHUTI in a video of maximum 10 minutes (This video may include capturing the events, reporting the events, interviews of different people and your own innovations) and write a report (in Hindi or English) of not more than 300 words describing ANUBHUTI.
 • Mail this video and the report on 20th feb.’17 (by 3:00 P.M.) at "englishlit@anbti.in" or at "hindilit@anbti.in".


 Event organizers:
 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact)

इशारों-इशारों में नाम से प्रचलित डम्ब शराड्स की प्रतियोगिता अत्यंत मनोरंजक होती है। इस प्रतियोगिता के नियम कुछ ही समय में उपलब्ध होंगे।


 किसी भी अन्य जानकारी के लिए संपर्क करें:-

 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact) Mail: hindilit@anbti.in

यह अशुभाषण की प्रतिस्पर्धा है, इस प्रतिस्पर्धा के अंतर्गत आपको दिए गए विषय पर अपने विचार व्यक्त करने होंगे। आप स्वतंत्र होंगे विषय को किसी भी प्रकार से प्रस्तुत करने को जैसा कि प्रतिस्पर्धा का नाम है; किन्तु आपके वक्तव्य का प्रभावी होना अनिवार्य है। दोनों ही चरणों में प्रतिभागियों को 200 सेकंड्स का समय दिया जाएगा; जिसका विभाजन निम्न प्रकार से होगा:-

 • 40 सेकंड्स विचार निर्माणद्ध
 • 120 सेकंड्स वक्तव्य व्याख्यानद्ध
 • 30 सेकंड्स निष्कर्ष ऩिरूपणद्ध
 • अन्तिम 10 सेकंड्स चेतावनी काल के रूप में होंगे, जिसके पष्चात् ऋणात्मक अंकन प्रारम्भ हो जाएगा।

 प्रथम चरण:-
 • इस चरण में आपको दिए गए किसी विषय, पंक्ति, चित्र अथवा चलचित्र पर अपने विचार व्यक्त करने होंगे।
 • चरण की संरचना उपर्युक्त लिखित होगी।
 • प्रदर्शन के आधार पर १२ प्रतिभागियों का चयन अगले चरण के लिए होगा।

 अंतिम चरण:-
 • इस चरण के नियम आपको प्रतिस्पर्धा स्थल पर ही बताएं जायेंगे।


 किसी भी अन्य जानकारी के लिए संपर्क करें:-

 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact) Mail: hindilit@anbti.in

कविता करना खेल नहीं है, पूछो इन फनकारो से।
 यह लोहे को काट रहे है, कागज की तलवारों से।।

 नगमे को दानेश्वरी बनाना, और दानेश्वरी को नगमे में इस तरह ढाल देना की वो जिन्दगी से गुफ्तगू करने लगे, यह काफी मुश्किल कार्य है। इस मुश्किल कार्य को बहुत ही सरलता से कर देना एक कवि की रचनात्मक शक्ति को दर्शाता हैं।
काव्यांजलि आपको एक ऐसा मंच प्रदान करता है जो आपके अंदर छुपी रचनात्मक शक्ति से आपको एवं समस्त कविता प्रेमी श्रोतागणोंसे रूबरू करवाएगी। अतः अपनी रचनात्मक शक्ति की अनुभूति हेतु इस प्रतियोगिता में भाग लें एवं अपने अंदर की भावनाओं को प्रकट करें। काव्यांजलि एक काव्य प्रतियोगिता है जिसमे सभी प्रतिभागी अपनी स्वरचित कविता के माध्यम से अपनी भावनाएं व्यक्त कर सकते हैं।

 प्रतियोगिता के दो चरण हैं:-

 • प्रथम चरण में सभी प्रतिभागियों को अपनी स्वरचित कविता (कविताओं) की एक ऑडियो क्लिप भेजनी होगी जिसका समय 1 से 2 मिनट होना चाहिए। इसके साथ ही अपनी स्वरचित कविताओं को देवनागरी लिपि में (PDF फॉर्मेट) "hindilit@anbti.in" पर भेजना होगा।
 • अन्य किसी भी भाषा में कविता को स्वीकार नहीं किया जायेगा।
 • प्रथम चरण में चयनित प्रतिभागियों को सूचित कर दिया जायेगा।
 • प्रथम चरण में चयनित प्रतिभागियों को दूसरे चरण में निर्णायक मंडली के समक्ष मंच पर अपनी स्वरचित कविता ;कविताओंद्ध का वाचन करना होगा।
 • प्रतिभागी एक या एक से अधिक कविताओं का वाचन अपने काव्यपाठ में कर सकता हैं।
 • काव्यपाठ की कुल समयावधि 6 - 7 मिनट तक ही होनी चाहिए।
 • निर्णायक मंडली का निर्णय ही अंतिम एवं सर्वमान्य होगा।


 किसी भी अन्य जानकारी के लिए संपर्क करें:-

 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact) Mail: hindilit@anbti.in

'र्माधर्म संग्राम'
 विश्व के सर्ववृहद महाकाव्य महाभारत से प्रेरित यह प्रतिस्पर्धा हिंदी साहित्यिक कार्यक्रमों का विशेष आकर्षण होगी। अधिक जानकारी के लिए स्टार प्लस द्वारा २०१३ में प्रसारित महाभारत देखें।


 किसी भी अन्य जानकारी के लिए संपर्क करें:-

 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact) Mail: hindilit@anbti.in

समूह चर्चा की यह प्रतिस्पर्धा अत्यंत रोचक व परस्पर संचारपूर्ण होती है। चयनित समूह को किसी दिए गए विषय पर आपस में चर्चा करके एक उपयुक्त व सर्वमान्य निष्कर्ष पर आना होता है। प्रत्येक वक्ता दिए गए विषय के पक्ष में अथवा विपक्ष में अथवा उदासीन रहते हुए अपने विचार रख सकता है।

 प्रथम चरण:-
 • इस चरण में भाग ले रहे समूह को दिए गए विषय पर ६० सेकंड्स विचार करने हेतु दिए जायेंगे तत्पश्चात क्रमशः प्रत्येक सदस्य को ३० - ३० सेकंड्स में अपना परिचय देते हुए अपना दृष्टिकोण स्पष्ट करना होगा।

 अंतिम चरण:-
 • अंतिम चरण में चयनित प्रतिभागियों का पैनल बनाया जाएगा जोकि एक मध्यस्थाधिकारी के माध्यम से संचालित होगा। बहुचर्चित टीवी समाचार चर्चाएँ इसी संरचना पर आधारित होती हैं।


 किसी भी अन्य जानकारी के लिए संपर्क करें:-

 Name(Contact)
 Name(Contact) Mail: hindilit@anbti.in

string-array.name: informal_event_details
string-array.item: Get to win prizes in random fun games, Full of entartainment.

string-array.name: lan_event_details
string-array.item: Enjoy various LAN games at Anubhuti. Compete with others to win exciting prizes and goodies.

• ₹100 for girls’ team for all years.
 • ₹250 for Ist year teams (KNIT and REC).
 • ₹50 each for rest of years.
 • ₹500 for teams registering in Anubhuti.
 • ₹1200 for teams not registered for Anubhuti.

 Prizes:
 Merchandise and goodies worth 8000 for winner and Ist runner up.

Entry fees
 • ₹50 per participants for boys.
 • ₹20 per participants for girls.

 Exciting prizes and goodies.

Rules and regulation’s 

 • Each team must consist of 5 players.
 • Players will have to arrange mobile phones for themselves.
 • A single version of the game will be provided to all the players.
 • Maps available are - “subdivision”, “catacomb”, “bottle neck” and “no escape”.

 Entry fees
 • ₹150 per team for boys.
 • ₹80 per team for girls.
 • Exciting prizes for winners.

resources.string: The tiny one with not so tiny dreams…
